definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: At school, those big and strong guys always come to find my trouble.
sentences.chinese: 學校裏，那些長得人高馬大的傢伙常來找我的麻煩。

sentences.english: When you are a big guy, you are likely to have big problems.
sentences.chinese: 如果你長得人高馬大，你可能會遇到很大的麻煩。

sentences.english: At school, those big and strong guys always come to pick on me.
sentences.chinese: 學校裏，那些長得人高馬大的傢伙常來找我的麻煩。

sentences.english: Yaoming not only is tall , but also has good skill sand speed.
sentences.chinese: 姚明不僅僅人高馬大，而且具有良好的技術和速度。
